PC Number: 2015-1157

Date: 2015-07-31

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the remuneration, in the amount and on the date indicated in the annexed schedule, of:

 

Ballantyne, Meena, Coordinator, Office of the Coordinator, Status of Women, within the range ($195,500 - $229,000), effective May 12, 2014 and within the range ($196,600 - $230,200), effective April 1, 2015;
